typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> in5K1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet') ~> in5K2
in5K1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeAvro
in5K2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['5K/flights5K.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> writeCSV
